name: Final Reckoning
description:
Make sure you play in fullscreen mode!

Fight off an overwhelming bandit raid with limited personnel and supplies. Use tactics such attacking from a flanking position and hitting multiple enemies with your attacks to gain the upper hand in the fight. Inspired by games such as Advance wars, Xcom EU, but also tabletop games such as 40k and Flames of war. 

Controls

WASD to move units around

Tab to lock on to targets within range

Space to attack your currently locked on target

Enter to end your turn or switch to next unit

Esc to access game menu
